pullrequest.title: Use target based compile options to specify C++ standard

content.raw:
CI doesn't like this:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-none&build=105)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-none/105/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-none/105/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=120)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/120/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/120/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1884)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1884/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1884/

there seems to be a problem compiling  the gazebo msgs generator

~~~
# ubuntu
gazebo/msgs/generator/GazeboGenerator.cc:52:5: error: ‘unique_ptr’ is not a member of ‘std’
     std::unique_ptr<io::ZeroCopyOutputStream> output(
     ^
~~~

~~~
# macOS brew
/usr/local/include/google/protobuf/stubs/port.h:114:2: error: "Protobuf requires at least C++11."
#error "Protobuf requires at least C++11."
 ^
1 error generated.
make[2]: *** [gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebomsgs_out.dir/generator/gazebo_generator.cc.o] Error 1
~~~
content.html:
CI doesn't like this:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-none/105/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/120/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1884/

there seems to be a problem compiling the gazebo msgs generator

# ubuntu
gazebo/msgs/generator/GazeboGenerator.cc:52:5: error: ‘unique_ptr’ is not a member of ‘std’
     std::unique_ptr<io::ZeroCopyOutputStream> output(
     ^

# macOS brew
/usr/local/include/google/protobuf/stubs/port.h:114:2: error: "Protobuf requires at least C++11."
#error "Protobuf requires at least C++11."
 ^
1 error generated.
make[2]: *** [gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebomsgs_out.dir/generator/gazebo_generator.cc.o] Error 1
